title: The Dark King's Collection #1-4
description: Collection of the first four Dark King's novels. Including The Mad King, based on The Mad Hatter. The Jaded King, based on Beauty and the Beast. The Magic King, based on Rumplestiltskin, and The Wolf King based on The Big Bad Wolf.  You might think you know their stories, but you couldn't be more wrong. Told from the point of views of the villains of the tales, these are the characters you love to hate like you've never known them before.  A curse has come and ripped through Kingdom, tearing most of our villain's HEA afters apart and now it's up to a couple of fairies, some demented gods, and love that defies all reason to reset what's been made wrong...
author: Jovee Winters
